extendedIngredients.name: malt mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: Optional mix-ins (cooked sausage, cheese, blueberries, chocolate chips, cooked bacon, cinnamon chips, etc.)
metaInformation: ( sausage, cheese, blueberries, chocolate chips, bacon, cinnamon chips, etc.)

extendedIngredients.name: pancake mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cups Hungry Jack pancake mix (any variety)

recipes.title: Grab N Go Pancake Muffins
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350F. Grease muffin tins or line with liners; set aside.2. In a medium mixing bowl, add pancake mix, milk, eggs and pancake syrup. Mix well.3. Fill muffin tin cavities  of the way full. Add about 1 tbsp. of mix-ins to the top of each muffin.4. Bake for 14-15 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.5. Serve warm. Allow extras to cool completely and refrigerate for up to 3 days or freeze.To reheat, microwave in 30-second intervals at 50% power until warm.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 350F. Grease muffin tins or line with liners; set aside.2. In a medium mixing bowl, add pancake mix, milk, eggs and pancake syrup.
Mix well.3. Fill muffin tin cavities  of the way full.
Add about 1 tbsp. of mix-ins to the top of each muffin.4.
Bake for 14-15 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.5.
Serve warm. Allow extras to cool completely and refrigerate for up to 3 days or freeze.To reheat, microwave in 30-second intervals at 50% power until warm.
